oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Raider Forties
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Raider Forties recounts the experiences of a group of young men who attended Middle Tennessee State College prior to World War II--ten of whom left to serve in the military. It traces the lives of those who returned and commemorates those who did not. Many professors and other campus personalities are discussed as well.
Part 1. The forty frosh -- The year two -- Summer of '42 -- The Fall of '42 -- Departure -- Rehearsal -- Where did all the flowers go? -- Return -- Part 2. Taps.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Male college students; Military cadets; Military education; Veterans--Education; Middle Tennessee State Teachers College; Middle Tennessee State College
